title: Heroes of Might and Magic 3+AB+SoD.rar
description:
Heroes of Might and Magic III: The Restoration of Erathia (also known as Heroes III or HoMM3) is a turn-based strategy game developed by New World Computing for Microsoft Windows and released by the 3DO Company in 1999


This is a done installed rared game.
With The two expansions Armageddons Blade and Shadow of Death.

Download.
Unrar
Run HOMM3.REG
and start the game with:
heroes3_31_crk.exe

Its a old good Classic..IMO its still the best game in the series

If you Like it support me by joining my forum at http://damdidum.net

For General discussions and requests
